articles.title: Microsoft raises Xbox Game Pass prices by as much as 25% - BBC.com
articles.description: The gaming giant said its PC Game Pass subscription would increase by £2 to £9.99 per month.
articles.content:
Microsoft has announced big price rises for Game Pass, its Netflix-style subscription service for games.
